summary: The Apaches are on the warpath and the Army must defend them. Murphy's mission is to get a shipment of rifles, but it's stolen by greedy white traders with the help of mutinous soldiers.
cast: Audie Murphy|Michael Burns|Kenneth Tobey|Laraine Stephens|Robert Brubaker|Michael Blodgett|Michael Keep|Kay Stewart|Kenneth MacDonald|Byron Morrow|Willard W. Willingham|Ted Gehring|James Beck|Maurice Hart|Jack Lilley
keywords: arizona territory|warpath|year 1868|apache pass|reference te the battle of apache pass
title: 40 rifles en el Paso Apache
